column18: 03/31/2016: Assailants threw explosive devices at a National Border Service (Senafront) post in Limon, Darien, Panama. There were no reported casualties in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources attributed the attack to the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC)
